Reason: The OPTIMIZE_OR configuration option is performance-sensitive. This is because the configuration directly affects the performance of the system by optimizing expressions through converting OR conditions to IN conditions. The configuration involves performance-related operations within its related code that have a substantial impact on system performance, making it performance-sensitive.
